      • createDialBackground

        @Nullable
public static android.graphics.Bitmap createDialBackground(android.graphics.Bitmap source,
                                                                     DialDrawer.Shape shape,
                                                                     DialDrawer.ScaleType scaleType)
        Create dial background bitmap for modify the bin file.
        Parameters:
        source - Source bitmap
        shape - DialDrawer.Shape
        scaleType - Background bitmap scale type
        Returns:
        If source bitmap is not available, it will return null

      • createDialPreview

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap createDialPreview(android.graphics.Bitmap background,
                                                        android.graphics.Bitmap style,
                                                        DialDrawer.Shape shape,
                                                        DialDrawer.ScaleType backgroundScaleType,
                                                        DialDrawer.Position stylePosition,
                                                        int outputWidth,
                                                        int outputHeight)
        Create dial preview bitmap for modify the bin file.
        Parameters:
        background - Background source bitmap
        style - Style source bitmap
        shape - Dial shape
        backgroundScaleType - Background bitmap scale type
        stylePosition - Style position
        outputWidth - Preview bitmap width
        outputHeight - Preview bitmap height
        Returns:
        If background bitmap or style position is not available, it will return null
